entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
